```py
Array of 4 elements: [0 1 2 3]
Notice the shape, this is rank 1 array: (4,)
after transpose: (4,)
```

```py
Row vector using reshape: [[0 1 2 3]]
column vector using reshape:
 [[0]
 [1]
 [2]
 [3]]
```

```py
Row vector using expand_dims: [[0 1 2 3]]

 [2]
 [3]]
```
